issue.title: imdb.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

None

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

www.imdb.com

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

I'm using ublock on waterfox with adguard's list and the ads are blocked in the site but the places where the ads were arent removed.

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: Https изначально отключено. При установке приложения в adguard по умолчанию фильтрует трафик нового приложения. В данном случае приложение не работает должным образом, пока полностью не отключить фильтрацию для данного приложения.

### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://kbjfree.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fkbjfree.com%2F) ### Comment > https://kbjfree.com/ > 就这个网址，一旦开了广告过滤插件就直接不给进，必须关闭广告过滤才能成功进去 ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/02wVW6L.jpg)

Block WebRTC,
